    • 方法详细资料

      • getConfigIntData

        public static int[] getConfigIntData(java.lang.String fileName,
                                     java.lang.String item)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Gets the current int data for an option for a configuration file 得到一个配置文件的某个选项的当前整型数据
        参数:
        fileName - Configuration file name
        item - Option name
        返回:
        An array of int that stores configuration data
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If IO connection failed
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If fileName not found

      • getConfigStringData

        public static java.lang.String[] getConfigStringData(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                     java.lang.String item)
                                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                                     java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Gets the current string data for an option for a configuration file 得到一个配置文件的某个选项的当前字符串数据
        参数:
        fileName - Configuration file name
        item - Option name
        返回:
        An array of strings that stores configuration data
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If IO connection failed
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If fileName not found

      • setAllConfigInitialization

        public static void setAllConfigInitialization(java.lang.String fileName)
                                       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                              java.io.IOException
        Reset all configuration options to default 设置所有选项至默认
        参数:
        fileName - Configuration file name
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If fileName not found
        java.io.IOException - If IO connection failed

      • setConfigInitialization

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> setConfigInitialization(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String item)
                                                                                                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                                                                java.io.IOException
        Reset a configuration option to default 设置某个选项至默认
        参数:
        fileName - Configuration file name
        item - Option name
        返回:
        A hashMap that stores the default data for the option
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If fileName not found
        java.io.IOException - If IO connection failed
